content_html: A special citizen help desk has been set up at the Gongabu New Bus Park in Kathmandu to assist people during the festive season. The Kathmandu Valley Traffic Office organized the opening of this service. The Chief of the Kathmandu Valley Police Office, Dan Bahadur Karki, officially inaugurated the help desk on Thursd

title: Festival-Focused Citizen Help Desk Opens at Gongabu New Bus Park
